name: File Survival
description:
Made for LudumDare #46 under the theme "keep it alive",  we made an OS simulator, which... may no be what you expect.

Controls:
  • Your mouse and keyboard.
  • Change windows size: F2, F3, F4, F5
Instructions:
  • Just read the messages carefully!
Hidden features:
  • You can actually change the color pallete in-game! Just look for the small icon in the taskbar.
  • Use the media player for a little surprise.
